svg.style: font-family: 'Helvetica Neue', Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 18px; background-color: white; text-rendering: optimizeLegibility; -webkit-font-smoothing: antialiased;

text.tspan: Consumption-based vs. production-based CO₂ emissions per capita, 2015
Consumption-based versus production-based carbon dioxide (CO₂) emissions per capita, measured in tonnes per
person. Production-based emissions are national emissions produced within a country's boundaries.
Consumption-based emissions are adjusted for emissions embedded in trade (i.e. territorial emissions minus exports
Source: Based on Global Carbon Project (GCP) and UN Population (UNWPP, 2017)
